title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 702.7 - Strip search/strip frisk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 702.7 - Strip search/strip frisk

State Regulations

The procedures for processing grievances alleging violation
of department policy regarding strip searches or strip frisks as outlined in
section
701.10
of this Title, shall be followed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
702.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
